data.meta_description: Learn about Bob Franklin on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that include Bob Franklin including Bad Eggs.
data.text:
Ham

At a backyard party, Tom meets a cute girl, Josh meets an odd boy, and a beer pong game gets really weird. Meanwhile, as Mum is admitted to a psychiatric hospital, Josh meets her fellow patients and feels strangely at home.

Parmigiana

Josh is in a tizz as he prepares for a surprise date with Geoffrey. Arnold checks into Mumâs hospital. Mum and Ginger grow closer. Dad and Mae panic over baby Graceâs poo, and Tom finds himself in a bizarre love triangle.

Gang Keow Wan

Niamh finds out about Jenny and all hell breaks loose for Tom. Hannah joins a choir, Mum gets some shattering news, and Josh has a disastrous date, before an accident brings a car trip with Patrick to an unexpected end.

Sausage Sizzle

A plumbing misadventure leaves Josh short of cash. Claire returns home. Mum and Ginger have a fight. Josh and Dad are forced to make a quick getaway, and Jennyâs school play provides a backdrop for romance and humiliation.

Truffled Mac and Cheese

Patrick moves out. Tom eats Joshâs truffled mac and cheese, so Josh barricades him in his room all day. Arnold reveals to Josh that he has feelings for him. Dad forces Josh to find a job. Claire and Tom have a heart-to-heart.
